description: About 60 people linked arms in "circle of silence" at Douglas Courthouse calling for law changes.
title: Manx sexual offences laws: 'Circle of silence' protest held at courthouse
title_page: Manx sexual offences laws: 'Circle of silence' protest held at courthouse - BBC News
maintext: Mr Watson said there was a need for a support centre for victims, intervention for those who were in danger of offending and harsher penalties for those convicted of offences.
